sourcesContent:
import { Component, HostListener } from '@angular/core'; import { BreakpointObserver, Breakpoints } from '@angular/cdk/layout'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { map, shareReplay } from 'rxjs/operators'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent { screenWidth!: number; public isExpanded: boolean = false; isHandset$: Observable = this.breakpointObserver.observe(Breakpoints.Handset) .pipe( map(result => result.matches), shareReplay() ); constructor(private breakpointObserver: BreakpointObserver ) { this.getScreenSize(); } @HostListener('window:resize', ['$event']) getScreenSize() { this.screenWidth = window.innerWidth; // console.log(this.screenWidth); if(this.screenWidth <= 959){ this.isExpanded = true; }else{ this.isExpanded = false; } } }
